product.title: Ecowood Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
product.description: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes. Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Porcelain
relproducts.description: Porcelain satin metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophistication to any room in the home. As for the colour? It matches everything. Give your lounge a contemporary makeover by opting for an ultra-trendy yellow and grey colour scheme. Paint one wall in a sunny yellow tone and the others in a soft white.

relproducts.title: Verona Blackout Porcelain Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Light, bright and simple, this stunning off white roller blind has a hint of neutral for added warmth and some great practical features too. The sleek, smooth look is a great match for that stunning shade, with its effortless sidewinder control making it as easy to use as it is t light, bright and simple, this stunning off white roller blind has a hint of neutral for added warmth and some great practical features too.

relproducts.title: Essence Porcelain Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: Like the finest porcelain this venetian blind has a delicate grey colouring thats perfect for creating a soft, warm atmosphere. The pastel tone will look at home alongside other light shades and of course the practical features of the blind mean that its a prime candidate like the finest porcelain this venetian blind has a delicate grey colouring thats perfect for creating a soft, warm atmosphere.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

relproducts.title: Alessi Porcelain Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Using a mix of matt and sheen threads to create a two tone pattern giving a touch of luxury to a room. Alessi porcelain roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The subtle dove grey of the porcelain grey satin, borne from the luxe ecowood deluxe range, is a refreshingly cool shade and sits on a smooth, untarnished surface across wide adjustable slats. Coordinating ladder tapes add to the designer feel. Use the porcelain grey satin as a toning accent to stronger shades, such as deep purple or rich red, in the master or guest bedroom. Paint a feature wall in your key colour, adding the blind as a way of breaking up the block colour, and coordinate accessories in matching colours.
